content: reserved this pattern is for personal use only 4 hannah bickerstaff - @hannahb_crafts head use 3mm hook and dark grey yarn round sts 1 single_crochet 6 in magic_ring 6 2 increase 6 12 single_crochet 6 in magic_ring 3 single_crochet 1 increase x6 18 4 single_crochet 2 increase x6 24 5 single_crochet 3 increase x6 30 6 single_crochet 4 increase x6 36 7 single_crochet 5 increase x6 42 8 single_crochet 6 increase x6 48 insert eyes between row 15 9-16 single_crochet round 8 row 48 and 16 about 10 sts apart 17 single_crochet 14 decrease x3 45 before you decrease too 18 single_crochet 7 decrease x5 40 much then stuff as you go 19 single_crochet round 40 making sure to stuff firmly 20 single_crochet 6 decrease x5 35 21 single_crochet round 35 22 single_crochet 5 decrease x5 30 23 single_crochet round 30 24 single_crochet 4 decrease x5 25 fasten_off and use tapestry 25 single_crochet 3 decrease x5 20 needle to pull the final 5 sts 26 single_crochet 2 decrease x5 15 tight then weave yarn ends 27 single_crochet 1 decrease x5 10 into the head 28 decrease x5 5 fasten_off and pull yarn through final 5 sts the finished head should look like a little balloon with a pointed bottom and round top continue on to the rest of the facial features © 2021 hb crafts all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only 5 hannah bickerstaff - @hannahb_crafts mouth use 3mm hook and beige yarn create oval starting round sts ring by single 1 chain 10 turn 9 crocheting both sides 2 single_crochet 8 increase 3 in 1 st turn and crochet 22 of the chain other side of chain single_crochet 8 increase 3 in 1 st 3 increase single_crochet 7 increase single_crochet 1 increase single_crochet 9 increase single_crochet 1 26 4 increase single_crochet 1 increase single_crochet 6 increase single_crochet 1 x3 increase single_crochet 34 finished item looks like 6 increase single_crochet 1 x2 this it will seem a little flat 5 increase single_crochet 1 increase single_crochet 3 half_double_crochet 4 single_crochet 3 increase 42 until you add stuffing sc1 x3 increase half_double_crochet 11 increase single_crochet 1 increase the bottom of the mouth 6 increase single_crochet 1 decrease single_crochet 13 decrease single_crochet 6 decrease 39 is the part with the 10 double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet 10 half_double_crochet decrease sltst to last st stitches make sure you place it this way on the fasten_off leaving long tail head attach to face with pins and use some stuffing to get the right shape the top of the mouth should be between row 17 and 18 of the head and the bottom should be between row 25 and 26 the outer edges will be approximately 2 sts further apart than the outside edge of the eyes once you re happy with the placement use the long tail and a tapestry needle to attach add extra stuffing to completely fill it before you sew the final few stitches © 2021 hb crafts all rights
